title: Fast-Feast
description: FastFeast is an online food ordering website created usingASP.NET Web Forms and MS SQL Server database. Thefrontend was developed using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.

title: Student Management System
description: This project is a web-based student management system developed using the ASP.NET MVC framework. It provides a streamlined solution for managing student information and academic records

title: Library Management System
description: This is an enterprise resource planning system for a library,used to track items owned, orders made, bills paid, andpatrons who have borrowed.

title: SmartX
description: This is an IOT based Smart Building control system that enables controlling home appliances remotely through a web application

title: Beauty-Bliss
description: Beauty-Bliss is an e-commerce cosmetics website

title: Train Reservation System
description: This is a Windows Forms desktop application designed tp check train sheduls and make train reservations
